channel.title: German army on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in German army on PepsFeeder

item.title: Investigations into the right-wing German soldiers
item.description: German Defense Minister Angrett Kramp-Kranbaur vowed on Sunday to take “decisive action” against any extremism in her country’s army, after reports that he had arrested a member of the elite forces (known as the KSK unit) on suspicion of extreme right-wing tendencies.
